item.title: Text Classification with LSTM
item.description: Deep Neural Network Before we further discuss the Long Short-Term Memory Model, we will first discuss the term of Deep learning where the main idea is on the Neural Network. So Neural Network is one branch of machine learning where the learning process imitates the way neurons in the human brain works. In Neural Network we know several terms, such as the input layer, hidden layer, and output layer. So the different betweetn Deep Learning and Neural Network architecture is the number of hidden layers specified.

item.title: Reproduce Economist Plot
item.description: Here is a tutorial how to replicate an economist publication plot using ggplot2. Please prepare the library required first and download the data on the link below to follow the code. link for download the report: https://www2.deloitte.com/content/dam/Deloitte/cr/Documents/public-sector/2014-Social-Progress-IndexRepIMP.pdf Load Library library(tidyverse) library(pdftools) library(ggthemes) library(ggpubr) library(tm) library(grid) library(ggrepel) library(scales) Import Data datatext <- pdf_text("data_input/2014-Social-Progress-IndexRepIMP.pdf") Data Pre-Processing datatext88 <- datatext[[88]] %>% read_lines() data1 <- datatext88[7:50] head(data1) #> [1] " 1 New Zealand $25,857 88.
